message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient is displaying signs of sexual abuse with the accusation of the art teacher, and this accusation should not be ignored. A referral should be made for confirmation of sexual abuse before any other therapies are pursued. Obtaining STD screening and performing a genitourinary exam are not relevant to the current situation, and while family therapy may be beneficial, it should not be the first step in the evaluation.
